SELECT * FROM crm_work_order WHERE id =(SELECT max(id) FROM crm_work_order WHERE serial_no LIKE '%crm%')

SELECT A.id,A.topic,A.serial_no,A.plan_comp_time,A.hope_comp_time,A.created_person,A.job_number,C.FDeptFullName AS deptName,A.project_name,D.product_name AS model,A.created_at as createdAt,A.matter_date,A.sn_no,A.real_op_time,A.finish_date_time, A.ultimate_customer,A.problem_type,A.problem_attach,A.problem_desc,A.problem_path,A.site_condition,A.rescue_action,A.fae_header,A.finish_user_id,A.finish_code,A.close_date_time,A.close_user_id,A.close_score,A.cancel_date_time,A.cancel_user_id, A.work_order_type,I.FHumanName AS receiverName,A.receiver,E.name as typeDesc,A.order_status,F.name as statusDesc,A.service_catalog_id,G.catalogName AS serviceCatalogDesc,H.name AS finishCodeDesc,A.order_type FROM crm_work_order A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.job_number=B.FUserName LEFT JOIN tsysdept C ON B.FDeptId=C.FSourceCode LEFT JOIN crm_product D ON A.model=D.crm_id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory E ON E.id=A.work_order_type LEFT JOIN orderStatus F ON F.id=A.order_status LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog G ON G.catalogId=A.service_catalog_id LEFT JOIN requestClosureCode H ON H.id=A.finish_code LEFT JOIN tsysuser I ON A.receiver=I.FUserName WHERE A.serial_no = #{serialNo}

SELECT A.id,A.topic,A.serial_no,A.plan_comp_time,A.hope_comp_time,A.created_person,A.job_number,C.FDeptFullName AS deptName,A.project_name,D.product_name AS model,A.created_at as createdAt,A.matter_date,A.sn_no,A.real_op_time,A.finish_date_time, A.ultimate_customer,A.problem_type,A.problem_attach,A.problem_desc,A.problem_path,A.site_condition,A.rescue_action,A.fae_header,A.finish_user_id,A.finish_code,A.close_date_time,A.close_user_id,A.close_score,A.cancel_date_time,A.cancel_user_id, A.work_order_type,I.FHumanName AS receiverName,A.receiver,E.name as typeDesc,A.order_status,F.name as statusDesc,A.service_catalog_id,G.catalogName AS serviceCatalogDesc,H.name AS finishCodeDesc,A.order_type FROM crm_work_order A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.job_number=B.FUserName LEFT JOIN tsysdept C ON B.FDeptId=C.FSourceCode LEFT JOIN crm_product D ON A.model=D.crm_id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory E ON E.id=A.work_order_type LEFT JOIN orderStatus F ON F.id=A.order_status LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog G ON G.catalogId=A.service_catalog_id LEFT JOIN requestClosureCode H ON H.id=A.finish_code LEFT JOIN tsysuser I ON A.receiver=I.FUserName WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT user_id as id,FEmail as email,FUserName username,FHumanName nickName,FEnName,FSourceNo,FPassword,FOrgId, FDeptId,FMobileNumber phone,create_time,create_by,update_time,update_by,FSex,FFlag, avatar_name,avatar_path,is_admin,pwd_reset_time FROM tsysuser WHERE user_id IN( SELECT sourceId FROM queuesToDept WHERE queuesId IN (SELECT defaultQueueId FROM subServiceCatalog WHERE catalogId = #{catalogId}) )
